https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sh822zcLjxGfF2BogCOLLNCPvSu.jpg With her California hometown in the rearview mirror, Belle heads north on business to catalog the sale of a large mansion. While the job is a dream, the client, Hunter Lowell, is not. But, as the two spend more time together, his icy demeanor begins to melt.
